author: Megan Rose Dickey
title: Bird lays off about 30% of workforce amid COVID-19 pandemic
description: Bird is the latest startup hit by the COVID-19 pandemic. Today, Bird laid off about 30% of its employees amid the uncertainty caused by the coronavirus, TechCrunch has learned. “The unprecedented COVID-19 crisis has forced our leadership team and the board of…
